__e: Each of us in this room understands a life eviscerated by the actions of another.
There is still time before it is destroyed by that bomb that has been left behind.
This picture displays the church before it was destroyed by fire on March 2nd, 2008.
It must be destroyed, and with it the dead.
Your whole planet is gonna be destroyed and you sit here wasting time?
- I need to know how long it was there, who had it bulldozed and why.
